mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, 1868 December 9
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, December 9, 1868. Mount Vernon. Private. Regent may be forced to return home to save her property. Wishes to settle gardener's appointment before leaving. House opened Dec. 14 with ceremonies at Tomb. Publicity planned. Attic white-washed. Plans an Appeal and for its circulation.
